title: Bug 114470[Smoke] - Error message thrown when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter
description: When using new Date('3/2/2005') as a value in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
OB: When using new Date('3/2/2005') as a value in a table filter, an error message is thrown. The error message is not provided in the bug report.
EB: The expected behavior is that the value new Date('3/2/2005') should be accepted and used as a valid filter value in the table.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a data source and a dataset containing a datetime column.
2. Insert a table and create a filter based on the datetime column.
3. In the value1 field of the filter, input new Date('3/2/2005').
